title: Calories in Baby Potatoes
meta_description: Discover calories in baby potatoes per 100 g serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for easy tracking.
assumptions: Boiled baby potatoes, skin on, no added salt, butter, or oil; similar to new potatoes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, cooking method, and additions like seasonings. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of boiled baby potatoes provide ~87 kcal and ~20 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Roasted with 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g
Mashed with 1 tbsp butter per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g baby potatoes?
faqs.a: About 87 kcal for boiled baby potatoes.

faqs.q: Are baby potatoes high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, ~20 g carbs per 100 g, mostly starch with 1.8 g fiber.

faqs.q: What's the protein in baby potatoes?

faqs.a: Very low, only 0.1 g total fat per 100 g when boiled plain.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in baby potatoes?
faqs.a: Boiling keeps calories low; roasting or frying with oil increases them significantly.
